resources.string:
This application is a study project made in pairs, the goal is to develop an Android application using Android Studio. It took place during our second year of the Networks and Telecoms Bachelor. 

Our application allows you to obtain all the useful information on an IP address (broadcast address, mask and network address, address range and the number of available addresses). It also allows you to find the number of possible sub-networks for a given block of network addresses using VLSM. Finally, it provides you with a wifi analyser. 

For information, problems or anything else, don't hesitate :

Hint about interfaces : 
 -Dummy : Similar to Loopback 
 -Wlan : WI-FI connection 
 -Rmnet : cellular connection 
 -Loopback : virtual interface that is always on
Note : some functionalities won\'t work if location services are disabled
